column4: anytime i move an icon on my desktop, it is copying instead of moving... any ideas?
what do you mean by mvoing, shifting it around on the desktop?
just simply clicking and draggin it somewhere else on the desktop
How long has this been happening
i understand that. it is only something with my local machine and i dont know what is going on
so a restart didn't fix it, is your mouse stuffed?
restart did nothing. stuffed?? i dont follow. it moves it when i hold ctrl... it is like move and copy are flipped.
have you check your mouse preferences under System->Prefereces->Mouse?
Not left mouse button ticked is it
do you have the option of trying another mouse, a spare one?
it is a touchpad on my laptop and it does not act up on anything besides the desktop
has there been any updates to the Xserver or anyother updates recently, i.e. has anything changed much or been updated on your system.
i was messing with nautilus earlier and i think that is what did it

If I were you, I would create another account and see if it goes back to normal. If it does then I would either copy stuff across to the new user account. The other option is to try open your home folder and go to edit->preferences and under there are some mouse settings.
